If you wish to customize PrestaShop for your * needs please refer to http://www.prestashop.com for more information. * * @author PrestaShop SA <contact@prestashop.com> * @copyright 2007-2013 PrestaShop SA * @license http://opensource.org/licenses/osl-3.0.php Open Software License (OSL 3.0) * International Registered Trademark & Property of PrestaShop SA */
/** * Get a feature data for a given id_feature and id_lang * * @param integer $id_lang Language id * @param integer $id_feature Feature id * @return array Array with feature's data * @static */

subNode:value.scalar:string: feature_lang` fl ON ( f.`id_feature` = fl.`id_feature` AND fl.`id_lang` =

scalar:array.comment: /** * Get all features for a given language * * @param integer $id_lang Language id * @return array Multiple arrays with feature's data * @static */

subNode:value.scalar:string: SELECT DISTINCT f.id_feature, f.*, fl.* FROM `
feature_lang` fl ON (f.`id_feature` = fl.`id_feature` AND fl.`id_lang` =

scalar:array.comment: /** * Delete several objects from database * * @param array $selection Array with items to delete * @return boolean Deletion result */
/** * Count number of features for a given language * * @param integer $id_lang Language id * @return int Number of feature * @static */
/** * Create a feature from import * * @param integer $id_feature Feature id * @param integer $id_product Product id * @param array $value Feature Value */

subNode:value.scalar:string: feature_product` fp ON f.`id_feature` = fp.`id_feature` LEFT JOIN `
feature_lang` fl ON f.`id_feature` = fl.`id_feature` WHERE fp.`id_product` IN (
GROUP BY f.`id_feature` ORDER BY nb DESC

scalar:array.comment: /** * This metohd is allow to know if a feature is used or active * @since 1.5.0.1 * @return bool */
/** * Move a feature * @param boolean $way Up (1) or Down (0) * @param integer $position * @return boolean Update result */
// < and > statements rather than BETWEEN operator
// since BETWEEN is treated differently according to databases
/** * Reorder feature position * Call it after deleting a feature. * * @return bool $return */

subNode:value.scalar:string: feature` f LEFT JOIN ( SELECT @i := @i +1 AS rank, id_feature, position FROM `
feature` JOIN (SELECT @i :=1) dummy ORDER by position ) AS f2 USING (id_feature) SET f.position = f2.rank - 1

scalar:array.comment: /** * getHigherPosition * * Get the higher feature position * * @return integer $position */
